name: GunShot BattleGrounds - NEXT GEN
description:
I didn't uploaded a GSBG update for a year lol.......

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Scratch link - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/693818250/

-------------GunShot BattleGrounds - NEXT GEN----------

1: Well currently the game is in beta version so some glitches may appear.

2: Use your mouse to aim the incoming bots, also the red aim should be on the bots or they wont get shot by bullets.

3: Comment your score down below!

4: For all of you who are Frelm fans, Aesthetic the vector animation making software will release soon and I have much more planned for you all!

---------------------------Notes and Credits----------------------

1: Made for the Games Galore itch.io gamejam.

2: Art and code is by me, the music is To Wherever on YouTube.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow me to stay tuned and know when I will publish aesthetic!
